name: vitest-circleci-coverage
description: A Vitest plugin that generates coverage data for CircleCI's Smarter Testing.

scripts.generate: circleci run testsuite 'ci tests' --local --test-analysis=all && cat coverage.json | jq > coveragetmp.json && mv coveragetmp.json coverage.json
scripts.generate:ci: circleci run testsuite 'ci tests' --test-analysis=all && cat coverage.json | jq > coveragetmp.json && mv coveragetmp.json coverage.json
